Cities of Serberistan

Across the continent lay 7 major cities. The oldest and Grandest of these are the rival cities of Paterdoma and Vantocar. Spread across the nation are 5 smaller cities, Surniam, Iliamna, NameTBD, Elsamera, Dragnara. Surrounding these 7 cities are smaller villages and towns, many lay empty since the fall of the 3rd age. Some still maintain a permanent population, while others serve as a shelter for the traveling Sansuvut Nomads.
